sub_title: Director of Strategy & Marketing | MSc Communication Science | BSc Political Science | BA Media & Information | Product & Social Media Marketing

treasury_media.title: ‎Social Media, Tech & Politics with Sne Prasad Alam on Apple Podcasts
treasury_media.description: "The Social Media, Technology & Politics Podcast explores the intersection of these three dynamic fields, delving into the latest trends, issues and controversies shaping our digital world. From the impact of social media on elections and political discourse, to the ethical implications of emerging technologies, this podcast is your go-to source for insightful analysis and expert commentary on the most pressing issues of our time."

treasury_media.title: Web Freedom vs.  Accountability : Invited speaker: S P  Alam at IEEE ComSoc TC, December 21, 2020
treasury_media.description: The age of the internet may be a new part of modern life for many people around the world; however, there the upcoming generation Z, including myself, are native to this digital world. In this talk for IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers) Communication Society (ComSoc technical committee) on 21 of December 2020, I discussed the inadvertent dangers of the expansion of the internet.

treasury_media.title: The Making of The Impact of The Internet on Politics
treasury_media.description: I am interested in cybersecurity & data privacy and the lack thereof which has led to data mining and its effect on democracy. As the world embraces digitalization, our daily lives become filled with all forms of digital media containing our data; therefore, I find data privacy to be one of the biggest topics of discussion in our society and politics.

treasury_media.title: The Emancipatory Potential of Social Media
treasury_media.description: As the internet became more prominent in the 21st century, people around the world have started to use it not only as a platform to interact with other people but also as a way to start social movements. This begs the question of whether social media is an emancipatory tool to society. Therefore the rise of social media has led to the democratization of information. Despite the drawbacks social media may present, social media can still be seen as a vital emancipatory tool in the modern world.

treasury_media.title: The impact of the Internet on Politics
treasury_media.description: The objective was to create a documentary using raw footage from interviews of tech specialists and find a specific angle and edit it together cohesively. I chose to focus on the impact of the internet on politics as it has become vital to our modern sense of governance and democracy. I chose to highlight data privacy, net neutrality, and “fake news” as they are popularized by the media.

profile_positions.description: SmartAvatar is an open real-time services platform that enables customers, partners, and integrators to create and deploy services that require real-time data processing, analytics, and action. It is a trustworthy digital services AI platform that provides trusted real-time smart services for the Internet of Things (IoT)1. SmartAvatar offers digital services for the software-defined Internet of Things based on a trustworthy services platform powered by AI1. It simplifies operations with a trusted services platform and generates revenue with an open real-time services platform1. The platform is self-compliant with GDPR and CCPA, ensuring data integrity, security, and privacy with granular secure access management.
profile_positions.title: Director of Strategy & Marketing

profile_positions.description:
The Danish Dutch Chamber of Commerce is a business network in the Netherlands. The Danish Chamber is a non-profit organization that helps you to build Danish Dutch business relations. We create network opportunities for business-people who have an interest in Denmark and The Netherlands.

The mission of the Danish Chamber is to help bringing  people and their businesses together. We believe that a good and genuine business relation starts with a personal contact in a neutral and relaxed place. Therefore, we organize meetings and webinars between people and combine inspiring business talks with Danish “hygge”.

By joining the Danish Chamber, you automatically broaden your network to include all Scandinavian Chambers of Commerce in The Netherlands. Together, we organize #NordicTalks – inspiring business-talks in corporation with the Nordic Embassy’s and the Nordic Council (Nordisk Råd).
profile_positions.title: Danish Dutch Chamber of Commerce - Intern

profile_positions.description: Lightyear is trailblazing startup that has created the world's first solar powered electric vehicle with a mission of providing clean mobility for everyone, everywhere. We at Lightyear believe we can break grounds for sustainable mobility through creating solar powered electric vehicles that are more aerodynamic than F1 cars. I will be part of the marketing team, specifically social media, to help spread the message and the amazing technology of Lightyear.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
With over 2000 members and a history dating back to 1964, Machiavelli is the oldest and largest study association for political science students in the Netherlands. Because of its history and size, Machiavelli is able to offer a wide variety of activities, ranging from debates and study trips, to parties and interesting excursions to places of relevance. Machiavelli also partners up with other political science and public administration associations by sharing best practices and organizing events together.

The Presidium arranges and hosts the General Assembly (GA) together with the secretary and chair of the board. The main function of the GA’s is to check up on the board. This is mainly done by checking their policy plans, year reports, and budget reports. There are three GA’s a year. During the Annual GA, the board will only present their budget report and the nominated board will present their policy plans. During the Semi-Annual GA, the board will discuss its half-year report and half-year budget report. During the Nomination GA, the board will present their full-year report.

Chair: The chair’s function is to make sure the GA runs smoothly. On the one hand, this is about preventing unnecessary repetitions and discussions, on the other hand, it is about providing enough opportunities for creative suggestions and insights. The Chair must ensure the most important aspect of the GA, make it the place where all members get the opportunity to share their views.
profile_positions.title: Chair of the Presidium

profile_positions.description: Secretary: Makes minutes during the General Assembly (GA) that will be posted on the Machiavelli website within two weeks after the GA, so all members can assess these. Must have sufficient knowledge of the statutes and regulations of the association. Together with a controlling member, counts the ballots after a vote.
profile_positions.title: Secretary of the Presidium
Programme Committee of the Faculty of Social Sciences
